SET UNICODE ON .
PRESERVE.
SET DECIMAL COMMA.

GET DATA  /TYPE=TXT
/FILE='[DATASET_FULL_PATH]'
/ENCODING='Locale'
/DELCASE=LINE
/DELIMITERS=";"
/QUALIFIER='"'
/ARRANGEMENT=DELIMITED
/FIRSTCASE=2
/DATATYPEMIN PERCENTAGE=100
/VARIABLES=
[VARIABLE_MAP]
/MAP.
RESTORE.
CACHE.
EXECUTE.
DATASET NAME [DATASET_NAME] WINDOW=FRONT.

insert file='[LABELS_FULL_PATH]' .

SAVE OUTFILE='[DATASET_SPSS_FULL_PATH]'
    /COMPRESSED.
